entry.title: TRAINING KIT JERSEY
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bluorng
Type: T-SHIRT
Price: 6300.00

Description

A fan jersey made for the club, for the world.

Built for grind and glory, the Training Kit football jersey in navy and grey blends high-performance design with street-ready appeal. Inspired by the classic charm of a vintage jersey, this luxury piece is crafted for those who push limits — whether you're hitting the field or repping the movement off it. Designed as an oversized jersey with a unisex fit, it delivers comfort, mobility, and unmistakable edge.

Carrying the relentless energy of Budweiser and the refined toughness of BLUORNG, it's more than just a top — it's a statement. Understated, sharp, and made to move with you.

Details

Regular fit with athletic stretch

100% POLYESTER

Weight - 225 GSM

Digital AND High-Density Print

Machine Wash Only

shipping

Packed within 24 hours.

Free delivery Pan-India.

Dispatches next day.

entry.title: AWAY KIT JERSEY
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bluorng
Type: T-SHIRT
Price: 6300.00

Description

A fan jersey made for the club, for the world.

The Away Kit Jersey redefines street luxury with its opulent gold and black tones. This football jersey is a symbol of champions and challengers alike—crafted for those who command attention even off the pitch. With Budweiser’s iconic confidence and BLUORNG’s sharp aesthetic, it blends sport with statement style.

Designed as an oversized summer jersey, it brings warmth along with effortless streetwear appeal. The bold silhouette suits everyone, making it perfect for layering during colder days. Whether you're repping your team or styling it daily, this unisex jersey delivers premium flair for every wardrobe.

Regular fit with athletic stretch

entry.title: HOME KIT JERSEY
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bluorng
Type: T-SHIRT
Price: 6300.00

Description

A fan jersey made for the club, for the world.

The Home Kit Jersey channels the unshakable spirit of match day. With a bold red and black palette that roars with energy, this goal football jersey captures the thrill of every strike and cheer. It’s where Budweiser’s legacy meets BLUORNG’s design precision—blending performance with style.

Crafted as an oversized vintage jersey, it brings back classic football vibes with a modern edge. Designed for maximum comfort and flair, this unisex jersey is for those who wear their loyalty loud. Whether you're in the stands or on the streets, this jersey brings the heat wherever you go.

entry.title: DRS PURPLE FULL SLEEVE JERSEY
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bluorng
Type: T-SHIRT
Price: 5800.00

Description

IMMERSE YOURSELF IN THE BLUORNG RACING CLUB EXPERIENCE WITH THE DRS PURPLE FULL SLEEVE JERSEY. THIS 250 GSM POLYESTER JERSEY HAS A RIBBED NECK AND DIGITAL PRINT IN THE FRONT AND THE BACK. THE INTRICATELY DESIGNED SILHOUETTE AND COLOUR PALETTE IS INSPIRED BY THE WORLD OF RACING WITH ADDED SCENTS OF BLUORNG'S SIGNATURE DESIGN LANGUAGE.
